properties.label: Horizontal Transport
properties.description: What is the method of horizontal advection of sea ice?

choices.label: Incremental Re-mapping
choices.description: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

properties.label: Transport In Thickness Space
properties.description: What is the method of sea ice transport in thickness space (i.e. in thickness categories)?

choices.label: Incremental Re-mapping
choices.description: (including Semi-Lagrangian)

properties.label: Ice Strength Formulation
properties.description: Which method of sea ice strength formulation is used?

properties.label: Redistribution
properties.description: Which processes can redistribute sea ice?

properties.label: Rheology
properties.description: Rheology, what is the ice deformation formulation?

choices.label: visco-plastic
choices.description: VP

choices.label: elastic-visco-plastic
choices.description: EVP

subProcesses.label: Energy
subProcesses.description: Processes related to energy in sea ice thermodynamics

properties.label: Enthalpy Formulation
properties.description: What is the energy formulation?

choices.label: Pure ice latent and sensible heat
Pure ice latent and sensible heat + brine heat reservoir (Semtner 3-layer)
Pure ice latent and sensible heat + explicit brine inclusions (Bitz and Lipscomb)

properties.label: Thermal Conductivity
properties.description: What type of thermal conductivity is used?

properties.label: Heat Diffusion
properties.description: What is the method of heat diffusion?

choices.label: Conduction, radiation and latent heat transport

properties.label: Basal Heat Flux
properties.description: Method by which basal ocean heat flux is handled?

choices.label: Heat Reservoir
choices.description: Brine inclusions treated as a heat reservoir

choices.label: Thermal Fixed Salinity
choices.description: Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)

choices.label: Thermal Varying Salinity
choices.description: Thermal properties depend on S-T (with varying salinity

properties.label: Fixed Salinity Value
properties.description: If you have selected {Thermal properties depend on S-T (with fixed salinity)}, supply fixed salinity value for each sea ice layer.

properties.label: Heat Content Precip
properties.description: Describe the method by which the heat content of precipitation is handled.

subProcesses.label: Mass
subProcesses.description: Processes related to mass in sea ice thermodynamics

properties.label: New Ice Formation
properties.description: Describe the method by which new sea ice is formed in open water.

properties.label: Ice Vertical Growth And Melt
properties.description: Describe the method that governs the vertical growth and melt of sea ice.

properties.label: Ice Lateral Melting
properties.description: What is the method of sea ice lateral melting?

properties.label: Ice Surface Sublimation
properties.description: Describe the method that governs sea ice surface sublimation.

properties.label: Frazil Ice
properties.description: Describe the method of frazil ice formation.

subProcesses.label: Salt
subProcesses.description: Processes related to salt in sea ice thermodynamics.

properties.label: Has Multiple Sea Ice Salinities
properties.description: Does the sea ice model use two different salinities: one for thermodynamic calculations; and one for the salt budget?

properties.label: Sea Ice Salinity Thermal Impacts
properties.description: Does sea ice salinity impact the thermal properties of sea ice?

properties.label: Salinity Type
properties.description: How is salinity determined in the mass transport of salt calculation?

enum.label: Salinity Method
enum.description: Method of describing the value of salinity

properties.label: Constant Salinity Value
properties.description: If using a constant salinity value specify this value in PSU?

properties.label: Additional Details
properties.description: Describe the salinity profile used.

properties.label: Salinity Type
properties.description: How is salinity determined in the thermodynamic calculation?

enum.label: Salinity Method
enum.description: Method of describing the value of salinity

properties.label: Constant Salinity Value
properties.description: If using a constant salinity value specify this value in PSU?

properties.label: Additional Details
properties.description: Describe the salinity profile used.

properties.label: Representation
properties.description: How is the sea ice thickness distribution represented?

enum.label: Ice Thickness Representation
enum.description: Types of sea ice thickness representation

choices.label: Virtual (enhancement of thermal conductivity, thin ice melting)

properties.label: Are Included
properties.description: Are melt ponds included in the sea ice model?

properties.label: Formulation
properties.description: What method of melt pond formulation is used?

properties.label: Impacts
properties.description: What do melt ponds have an impact on?

subProcesses.label: Snow Processes
subProcesses.description: Thermodynamic processes in snow on sea ice

properties.label: Has Snow Aging
properties.description: Set to True if the sea ice model has a snow aging scheme.

properties.label: Snow Aging Scheme
properties.description: Describe the snow aging scheme.

properties.label: Has Snow Ice Formation
properties.description: Set to True if the sea ice model has snow ice formation.

properties.label: Snow Ice Formation Scheme
properties.description: Describe the snow ice formation scheme.

properties.label: Redistribution
properties.description: What is the impact of ridging on snow cover?

properties.label: Heat Diffusion
properties.description: What is the heat diffusion through snow methodology in sea ice thermodynamics?

properties.label: Surface Albedo
properties.description: Method used to handle surface albedo.

enum.label: Seaice Albedo
enum.description: Surface albedo of sea ice component

choices.label: Parameterized
choices.description: Sea ice albedo is parameterized

choices.label: Multi-band albedo
choices.description: Albedo value has a spectral dependence

properties.label: Ice Radiation Transmission
properties.description: Method by which solar radiation through sea ice is handled.

choices.label: Ice radiation transmission per category
choices.description: Radiation transmission through ice is different for each sea ice category

propertySets.label: Horizontal
propertySets.description: Sea ice discretisation in the horizontal

properties.label: Grid
properties.description: Grid on which sea ice is horizontal discretised?

enum.label: Horizontal Grid
enum.description: Grid which is the sea ice horizontally discretised on?

choices.label: Ocean grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the ocean grid

choices.label: Atmosphere Grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on the atmospheric grid

choices.label: Own Grid
choices.description: Sea ice is horizontally discretised on its own independent grid

properties.label: Grid Type
properties.description: What is the type of sea ice grid?

choices.label: Adaptive grid
choices.description: Computational grid changes during the run

properties.label: Scheme
properties.description: What is the advection scheme?

properties.label: Thermodynamics Time Step
properties.description: What is the time step in the sea ice model thermodynamic component in seconds.

properties.label: Dynamics Time Step
properties.description: What is the time step in the sea ice model dynamic component in seconds.

properties.label: Additional Details
properties.description: Specify any additional horizontal discretisation details.

properties.label: Layering
properties.description: What type of sea ice vertical layers are implemented for purposes of thermodynamic calculations?

choices.label: Zero-layer
choices.description: Simulation has no internal ice thermodynamics.

choices.label: Two-layers
choices.description: Simulation uses two layers.

choices.label: Multi-layers
choices.description: Simulation uses more than two layers

properties.label: Number Of Layers
properties.description: If using multi-layers specify how many.

properties.label: Additional Details
properties.description: Specify any additional vertical grid details.

subProcesses.label: Seaice Categories
subProcesses.description: What method is used to represent sea ice categories ?

properties.label: Has Mulitple Categories
properties.description: Set to true if the sea ice model has multiple sea ice categories.

properties.label: Number Of Categories
properties.description: If using sea ice categories specify how many.

properties.label: Category Limits
properties.description: If using sea ice categories specify each of the category limits.

properties.label: Ice Thickness Distribution Scheme
properties.description: Describe the sea ice thickness distribution scheme

properties.label: Other
properties.description: If the sea ice model does not use sea ice categories specify any additional details.

properties.label: Has Snow On Ice
properties.description: Is snow on ice represented in this model?

properties.label: Number Of Snow Levels
properties.description: Number of vertical levels of snow on ice?

properties.label: Snow Fraction
properties.description: Describe how the snow fraction on sea ice is determined

properties.label: Additional Details
properties.description: Specify any additional details related to snow on ice.

properties.label: Model Name
properties.description: Name of seaice model (e.g. CICE 4.2, LIM 2.1, etc.)

subProcesses.label: Variables
subProcesses.description: List of prognostic variable in the sea ice model.

properties.label: Prognostic
properties.description: List of prognostic variables in the sea ice component.

enum.label: Prognostic Variables
enum.description: Prognostic variables in sea ice model

choices.label: Sea ice volume per grid cell area
Snow temperature
choices.description: Snow on ice temperature

choices.label: Snow depth
choices.description: Snow on ice thickness

subProcesses.label: Seawater Properties
subProcesses.description: Properties of seawater relevant to sea ice

properties.label: Ocean Freezing Point
properties.description: Equation used to compute the freezing point (in deg C) of seawater, as a function of salinity and pressure

enum.label: Seawater Freezing Point
enum.description: Types of seawater freezing point equation in sea ice.

choices.label: TEOS-10
choices.description: Thermodynamic equation of seawater 2010

choices.label: Constant
choices.description: Constant value of seawater freezing point is used.

properties.label: Ocean Freezing Point Value
properties.description: If using a constant seawater freezing point, specify this value.

subProcesses.label: Resolution
subProcesses.description: Resolution in the sea ice grid

properties.label: Name
properties.description: This is a string usually used by the modelling group to describe the resolution of this grid e.g. N512L180, T512L70, ORCA025 etc.

properties.label: Canonical Horizontal Resolution
properties.description: Expression quoted for gross comparisons of resolution, eg. 50km or 0.1 degrees etc.

properties.label: Number Of Horizontal Gridpoints
properties.description: Total number of horizontal (XY) points (or degrees of freedom) on computational grid.

subProcesses.label: Tuning Applied
subProcesses.description: Tuning applied to sea ice model component

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of tuning: explain and motivate the main targets and metrics retained.  Document the relative weight given to climate performance metrics versus process oriented metrics, and on the possible conflicts with parameterization level tuning. In particular describe any struggle with a parameter value that required pushing it to its limits to solve a particular model deficiency.

properties.label: Target
properties.description: What was the aim of tuning, e.g. correct sea ice minima, correct seasonal cycle.

properties.label: Simulations
properties.description: Which simulations had tuning applied, e.g. all, not historical, only pi-control?

properties.label: Metrics Used
properties.description: List any observed metrics used in tuning model/parameters

properties.label: Variables
properties.description: Which variables were changed during the tuning process?

subProcesses.label: Assumptions
subProcesses.description: Assumptions made in the sea ice model

properties.label: Description
properties.description: General overview description of any *key* assumptions made in this model.

properties.label: On Diagnostic Variables
properties.description: Note any assumptions that specifically affect the CMIP6 diagnostic sea ice variables.

properties.label: Missing Processes
properties.description: List any *key* processes missing in this model configuration? Provide full details where this affects the CMIP6 diagnostic sea ice variables?

subProcesses.label: Conservation
subProcesses.description: Conservation in the sea ice component

properties.label: Description
properties.description: Provide a general description of conservation methodology.

properties.label: Properties
properties.description: Properties conserved in sea ice by the numerical schemes.

enum.label: Conserved Properties
enum.description: List of properties that can be conserved in sea ice

properties.label: Budget
properties.description: For each conserved property, specify the output variables which close the related budgets.

properties.label: Was Flux Correction Used
properties.description: Does conservation involved flux correction?

properties.label: Corrected Conserved Prognostic Variables
properties.description: List any variables which are conserved by *more* than the numerical scheme alone.
